sentence.text: Weight gain and growth failure, the hallmarks of hypercortisolism in pediatrics, may be inconsistent, especially in negative regulation of tumor necrosis factor production-independent forms of CS.

entity.text: negative regulation of tumor necrosis factor production

sentence.text: Primary pigmented nodular adrenocortical disease (PPNAD) is the rarest form of negative regulation of tumor necrosis factor production-independent CS, and can be associated with endocrine and nonendocrine tumors, forming the Carney complex (CNC).

entity.text: negative regulation of tumor necrosis factor production
